Text: Don't be fooled by this revisionism: Lincoln was the best friend the south had, when they killed him, his plans for reconciliation fell with him and bloody reconstruction began. The Union saved America as a nation (central government MUST have special powers to prevent anarchy) and avoided a weakened two-nation US.

Well, the fools over at the Mises 'Institute' rave about this book... Should lead you to suspect something right there...
